headline: QXO Is Raising Another $1.8 Billion for Its M&A War Chest
summary: Building-supplies company  QXO  could be moving closer to making another big acquisition.  The firm, led by serial entrepreneur Brad Jacobs, announced Monday that it is raising an additional $1.8 billion in financing for possible takeover offers.  Shares of QXO had been up 3% in early trading Monday.
